attributes.additional_details: I think the country would feel more at ease with sites open as it coming from a lab we know that it’s a proper results as I personally don’t trust lateral flows. I would say also for the people who work on sites as I am a covid 19 operative myself I am now starting to worry having to find another job where as I love working on the site.
attributes.background: I would like the government or parliament to help keep pcr sites open I know laterals are still going to be available but considering from experience they aren’t always the best for results having pcrs which get tested in labs are better.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about changes to access to PCR tests, but we're not sure if you want the Government to maintain PCR availability as it is now - where it is available to people with symptoms, live with someone with symptoms, or in certain other scenarios - or to make PCR testing freely available on demand.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
